The statement was issued by the American: ACPeds), a small and politically-motivated group, rather than the American Academy of Pediatrics (AAP) or a majority of pediatricians.
The tweet by Glenn Beck: which led to the belief that the AAP had taken a stance on gender dysphoria, actually linked to an article containing quotes from ACPeds, not the AAP.
